SEARCH
Package cp213

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
cp213.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Stores a List of MenuItems and provides a method return these items in a formatted String. May be constructed from an existing List or from a file with lines in the format: 
1.25 hot dog
10.00 pizza
...
Version:
2024-10-15
Author:
Michael Marsillo 169057769 mars7769@mylaurier.ca, Abdul-Rahman Mawlood-Yunis, David Brown

  • Constructor Details

    • Menu

      public Menu(List<MenuItem> items)
      Creates a new Menu from an existing List of MenuItems. MenuItems are copied into the Menu List.
      Parameters:
      items - an existing List of MenuItems.

    • Menu

      public Menu(Scanner fileScanner)
      Constructor from a Scanner of MenuItem strings. Each line in the Scanner corresponds to a MenuItem. You have to read the Scanner line by line and add each MenuItem to the List of items.
      Parameters:
      fileScanner - A Scanner accessing MenuItem String data.

  • Method Details

    • getItem

      public MenuItem getItem(int i)
      Returns the List's i-th MenuItem.
      Parameters:
      i - Index of a MenuItem.
      Returns:
      the MenuItem at index i

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the number of MenuItems in the items List.
      Returns:
      Size of the items List.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the Menu items as a String in the format: 
          5) poutine      $ 3.75
    6) pizza        $10.00
      where n) is the index + 1 of the MenuItems in the List.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
